response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value and significance for us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth every penny of its true market value. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure an item that could potentially be worth much more in the future. We would love to see this product enhance your experience and contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
